name: A lone wanderer's mildy eventful trip to the Pyramids of Giza
name_original: A lone wanderer's mildy eventful trip to the Pyramids of Giza
description:
A runner in the middle of running from her inevitable death bumps into an alien ship commander before being devoured by an other-worldly beast.

Started for NaNoRenO, need to polish and fix bugs before final version can be published here. For now I've put the version I made for NaNoRenO submission below. The final version won't take to long to finish so I'll be sure to update when that is ready.

Update: Final version's done and ready for download, polished the dialogue and changed the user interface design, cleaned it from bugs so the story can be fully played through. Pc and mac versions available to download.

Feedback would be appreciated.
